scripts.build: npm run build:workers && npm run build:mcp
scripts.build:workers: cd symbolai-worker && NODE_OPTIONS='--max-old-space-size=2048' npm run build || true && cd ../cloudflare-worker && npm run build || true
scripts.build:mcp: cd my-mcp-server-github-auth && npm run build || true
scripts.clean: rm -rf node_modules && npm run clean:workers && npm run clean:mcp
scripts.clean:workers: cd symbolai-worker && rm -rf node_modules && cd ../cloudflare-worker && rm -rf node_modules
scripts.update: npm update && npm run update:workers && npm run update:mcp
scripts.update:workers: cd symbolai-worker && npm update && cd ../cloudflare-worker && npm update
scripts.audit: npm audit && npm run audit:workers && npm run audit:mcp
scripts.audit:workers: cd symbolai-worker && npm audit || true && cd ../cloudflare-worker && npm audit || true
scripts.install:all: npm install && npm run install:workers && npm run install:mcp
scripts.install:workers: cd symbolai-worker && npm install --no-save || true && cd ../cloudflare-worker && npm install --no-save || true
